metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a comprehensive literature review focusing on methodologies, datasets, and performance benchmarks

extracted_sections.section_title: Graph Neural Network Architecture for Drug-Target Interaction
Methodology: Message Passing Networks for Molecular Property Prediction
Performance Analysis on ChEMBL and PubChem Datasets
Comparative Study of GNN Variants for Drug Discovery

subsection_analysis.refined_text: The proposed architecture employs a multi-layer graph convolutional network that processes molecular graphs by iteratively updating node representations through neighborhood aggregation. Each layer applies learnable transformations to capture both local and global molecular features...

We evaluate our approach on three standard benchmark datasets: ChEMBL (1.5M compounds), PubChem (94M compounds), and DrugBank (13K approved drugs). Performance metrics include ROC-AUC, precision-recall curves, and enrichment factors...
